synopsis.text:
This action-packed anime follows the escapades of Bolt Crank, a mercenary of unparalleled prowess, as he navigates through a world of high-tech and low-life, where the line between science and fairy tales blurs. Bolt, also known as Eat-Man, is no ordinary mercenary; he possesses an extraordinary ability to consume any object, primarily metals and weapons, and reproduce them at will from his right arm.

Despite his enigmatic aura, Bolt's charisma and unique abilities attract a plethora of clients, from business tycoons to damsels in distress. Bolt's moral compass guides him in accepting jobs, ensuring he completes each one, albeit sometimes pushing the boundaries of irony to uphold justice.

As Bolt continues his journey, he often finds himself in precarious situations, using his ability to recreate consumed items to extricate himself. This series offers a fresh take on the original Eat-Man, staying true to the creator's vision and presenting Bolt Crank's adventures in all their glory. Prepare for a thrilling ride filled with action, mystery, and a dash of romance!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
